ygData.subject: Re: Re: Eldritch Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, yeh my merchant faction is aimble with the merchants, and dubious with the guards, just the Eldrtich is screwed and not sure why...
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:00 AM 1/7/00 -0800, you wrote:
>Killing DE necros would not increase your faction with the merchants -
>with the Eldritch yes but not the merchants. The tinkering merchants use

Well, yeh my merchant faction is aimble with the merchants, and dubious
with the guards, just the Eldrtich is screwed and not sure why...







>the faction merchantsofak'anon, which can only be raised by doing the
>tedious Red V quest, the scrap metal quest and a few others. I've been
>able to get my merchant faction up to amiable from indifferent but it
>takes a LONG time to do so.
>
>As far as raising your Eldritch faction (although I hope I don't have that
>mixed up with the Gemchoppers) - I believe you can do so by killing the
>Kerrans. However, it has been a while since I've killed them and I'm not
>sure about the negative faction losses. Can anyone else verify that this
>is true and what the negative faction loss is?
>
>QdP
>
>"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"
>
>--- ALEX SHIMANOVSKY <10815@...> wrote:
>> Well, ok my question now then, any necro gnomes here tried Tinkering
>> befor
>> say 3 patches ago ? As far as I know i could tinker then and that stupid
>> mage in the 3rd Windmill did not kill me at all b4, 3 patches ago I
>> tried
>> tinkering again, maken aqualungs and all of a sudden that SOB attacks
>> me.
>>
>> did any necro had that problem ? sure killen DE necros can raise my
>> faction
>> but I really don't want to kill my DE faction then kill Halflings to
>> rais
>> it again, this faction thing is really hard to raise if they con READY
>> TO
>> ATTACK, from that to Dubiously might take like 30 hours of killing. If
>> not
>> more...
>>
>> 50 Gnome Necro 111 tinker skill, Emarr
>>
